name: Campfire: Choose Your Own Adventure
description:
CAMPFIRE

Created for a university project in response to randomly assigned boxes from varying collections of the University of Dundee Archives we were asked to create a piece of work for exhibition. 

I attempted to create an interactive game as part of my 3rd year Illustration course, with the help of game designer Owen Millward.

“A text adventure game with visuals. Fully constructed in Unity engine from scratch. Inspired by elements in the Archive’s collection of the University’s Rucksack Club- the club encouraged all ourdoor activities and interests. But be warned, it’s not safe to go out into the woods alone...”

Concept & Artwork: Fraser Robertson [Instagram]

Coding & Godsend: Owen Millward [itchio]
